url.description: The URL of the WordPress site on the remote server

path.description: The PATH to the WordPress installation on the remote server

host.description: The remote server's SSH hostname. Can be an IP address

port.description: The remote server's SSH port number

user.description: The username configured on the remote server for SSH connections

key.description: Name of the private key file used for connections to this remote server. It should match a corresponding file in the 'keys' directory. Keys may also be passed as environment secrets at runtime, in which case this property can be omitted
